summary: Semi-autobiographical story by Oskar Luts about friendship, love and life in a small Estonian country boarding school in the late 1800s. Followed by Suvi (1976) and Sügis (1990).
cast: Arno Liiver|Riina Hein|Aare Laanemets|Margus Lepa|Leonhard Merzin|Ain Lutsepp|Rein Aedma|Kalle Eomois|Raul Haaristo|Heiki Koort|Heido Selmet|Tõnu Alveus|Kaljo Kiisk|Endel Ani|Ita Ever|Silvia Laidla|Ervin Abel|Evald Tordik|Arnold Kasuk
keywords: male nudity|male rear nudity|based on book
title: Kevade
